local_intent: Lower until table contact at low force after precise alignment, then verify contact.
assumptions: Placement area is reachable and free of obstacles near the descent path
Force threshold of 5 is sufficient to detect table contact
coherence_with_global: Matches global step: ApproachAndAlign -> LowerUntilContact (slow, 0.05m, force 5, 1500ms) -> verify contact. Adds minimal retry around the lowering to handle missed contact, consistent with failure handling.
